About Me

Let me tell you about a few things...

BIO

I love to have my hand in technology while aspiring to be a Full Stack Developer. I am fascinated with the high pace and changing world of technology. I value my connections with clients, students and people in general. I enjoy utilizing my skills in online business consulting and SEO marketing as well as web design and other computer software engineering programs. I recently developed Event-Teller website as a individual project, and the RoboRace website as a group project using React, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Postman, and Material UI.

I am driven by my love of software evolution and passionate about technology that promotes the ever-changing tech world as it advances.

LegitLocal.com

Senior Sales Rep

I am a senior sales rep for Legit Local, a software program that makes it simple to obtain Google, Facebook, and Yelp reviews from customers who have interacted with a business. This software is key because it takes the hassle away from customers wanting to leave a review for your company on all three platforms. They simply leave one positive review and it is created on all three interfaces, the ones that you choose and that matter most.

e-Business Solutions

Online Marketing Advisor & Web Consultant

With e-Business Solutions, I was a online marketing and web consultant for small business owners. I would teach and coach people how to start, run, and update online businesses. I also would either assist or build websites for clients and teach them how to utilize SEO and other marketing skills to be successful in the online community.

Boostability

SEO Analyst

As an SEO and custom website account manager for Boostability, I'm required to oversee and implement online marketing strategy for more than 100 high-spend clients. I'm involved in every aspect of the client's campaign, from researching target search terms, to evaluating what content should be implemented on the client's site, to recommending website themes and working on various elements of graphic design.
